title: Getting Dressed
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 40 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: Getting Dressed introduces readers to vocabulary for familiar items of clothing. The familiar situation of getting dressed, repeated sentence pattern, and picture-to-text correspondence help early readers make meaningful connections.
meta: backpack, belt, glasses, jacket, pants, put, shirt, shoes, socks
